statements.select: select a.*,b.UserName From Pub_Location a inner join (select MAX(x.Id) Id From Pub_Location x inner join ( select dbo.FUNC_Oca_GetOpenIdByUserId(rtrim(ltrim(Item))) as openId from dbo.FUNC_Tol_String2Table($SourceIds$,$SplitChar$)) y on x.SourceId=y.openId where x.SourceTable='$SourceTable$' and x.LocateType='$LocateType$' and DATEDIFF(D,x.CheckInTime,GETDATE())=0 group by x.SourceId) d on a.Id=d.Id left join Pub_User b on b.UserId=dbo.FUNC_Oca_GetUserIdByOpenId(a.SourceId,'$StationId$')

select top 26 char(64+row_number() over(order by CheckInTime desc)) as SN,* From Pub_Location where SourceTable='$SourceTable$' and LocateType='$LocateType$' and DATEDIFF(D,CheckInTime,GETDATE())=0 and SourceId=dbo.FUNC_Oca_GetOpenIdByUserId('$SourceId$')
